name: Yufine
description: A lively Dragon girl who loves shiny things
story: Originally a Dragon of Wintenberg, through certain events Yufine eventually found her way to Ritania. Cheerful and curious, her excessive curiosity often leads to accidents. She loves shiny things so much that she tends to zone out while staring at them.
get_line: Oh, you need my help? Cool, let's go!

relations.description: Yufine has always admired her strong and friendly sister, Luna.
A friend of Luna's. Yufine met her several times when she visited their house.
When Yufine first saw Rin she wished she was able to dance like that, but before long realized she had no talent for it at all.
They would gossip together on her frequent visits to the World's End Pub, and before long they became close friends.
Yufine doesn't care if she never regains her memories from before she arrived in Ritania. All she needs is Garo!

specialty.name: Gossip Girl
specialty.description: She hangs around Garo quite often, so she hears a lot of things.

type.name: Unknown Knowledge
type.description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

skills.description: 35% chance to extend the caster's buff durations by 1 turn when using Double Slash.
skills.skill_description: Attacks by swinging their weapon, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before a 35% chance to extend the caster's buff durations by 1 turn.

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 30% when using Double Slash.
Increases chance of inflicting silence with Dragon's Roar by 15%.

skill1.name: 二段斬り
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 龍の叫び
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、強化効果を1つ解除し、75.0%の確率で沈黙を1ターンの間付与する。自身に攻撃力UP・スピードUPを2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 開天闢地
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与し、強化効果をすべて解除する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与し、強化効果をすべて解除する。
